thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Euston Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location
thread.title_full: Location - Review of Premier Inn London Euston Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: kevin9999
title: Location
text: Located within 5 minutes walking time between Euston and Kings Cross station, and 10 pubs! Great rooms and great service, as always! Great food nearby as well. This Premiere inn may be a bit older than some in London, but wear and tear is minimal. Great value given the location. The tubs seem to be abnormally high, hence making it more difficult to get in and out of my only complaint!
